WITH RECURSIVE dates AS ( SELECT DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01')) AS date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM dates WHERE date < LAST_DAY(DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'))) )
SELECT d.date, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN th.resAccountOut > 0 THEN th.resAccountOut ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalExpense FROM dates d LEFT JOIN transaction_history th ON th.transaction_date = d.date AND th.resAccount = #{resAccount} GROUP BY d.date ORDER BY d.date

SELECT c.id AS categoryId, c.name AS categoryName, SUM(t.resAccountout) AS totalExpense FROM transaction_history t JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.id WHERE t.resAccountOut > 0 -- 지출만 AND t.transaction_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY totalExpense DESC
